amendment.description: To modify a definition of research in regards to the Next Generation Lighting Initiative.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1400 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1400 proposed by Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S9942-9943; text: CR S9943) To modify a definition of research in regards to the Next Generation Lighting Initiative.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1400 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
